description: This Dart source file defines Flutter widgets for rendering HTML content within a WebView. It includes classes for encapsulating route information, displaying web pages loaded from assets, and a home page listing multiple HTML routes. It manages WebView configurations, loads HTML assets, injects JavaScript for error logging, and handles WebView lifecycle events.

classes.name: HtmlScreenRoute
classes.description: A data class representing a route to an HTML screen, including the title and asset path.

classes.name: HtmlAssetWebViewPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays an HTML asset in a WebView with loading and error handling.

classes.name: HtmlScreensHomePage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of available HTML routes for preview.

methods.name: _loadHtml
methods.description: Loads the specified HTML asset into the WebView controller, reading the asset and setting the base URL.
